pages.text: $(li)Pumpkin is a fruit block that appears over the Overworld.$(br)$(li)You can use Pumpkins to craft Pumpkin Bread, Large Pumpkin Slice, Pumpkin Seeds, Pumpkin Pie, Azuki Curry and a Pumpkin Armor in a Crafting Table.
$(li)This block can be grows up from a Pumpkin Seeds.$(br)$(li)You can create Carved Pumpkins right clicking while you are holding a Shears on your hand and your are pointing to a Pumpkin.
